author: hlship
msg: TAP5-228: When you have multiple forms on the same page that share (some of) the same properties, it is not possible to differentiate validation constraints and messages in the message catalog

author: amassari
msg: A regular expression with a negative character class was always stored as a positive character class, so trying to perform a case-insensitive match of "q" against "[^Q]" would fail because it was immediately exploded into [a-zA-PR-Z]; we now preserve the negative character class

author: ngn
msg: Full Javadoc coverage fro ftplet-api module
Returning socket addresses in the session

author: bentmann
msg: o Simplified filtering and avoided usage of platform encoding for robustness
